## Breusch-Pagan Test
Description: Performs the Breusch-Pagan test against heteroskedasticity.


```{r GetLibLMTest}
library(lmtest)
```

```{r DataName.lm.bp}
DataName.lm.bp = bptest(DataName.lm)
```

## Harrison-McCabe test
Description: Harrison-McCabe test for heteroskedasticity.



```{r DataName.lm.hmc}
DataName.lm.hmc = hmctest(DataName.lm)
```


## Goldfeld-Quandt Test
Description: Goldfeld-Quandt test against heteroskedasticity.

```{r DataName.lm.gq}
DataName.lm.gq = gqtest(DataName.lm)
```
